titles.title: North American Wetlands Conservation Extension Act
To extend the authorization of appropriations for allocation to carry out approved wetlands conservation projects under the North American Wetlands Conservation Act through fiscal year 2020.
North American Wetlands Conservation Extension Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Federal Lands.

bill.summary:
North American Wetlands Conservation Extension Act
This bill amends the North American Wetlands Conservation Act to extend the authorization for the Department of the Interior to carry out certain wetlands conservation projects through FY2020.
